title: Loan Calculator
prompt:
Create a loan payment calculator with the following:

Loan Details:
- Principal Amount: $250,000
- Annual Interest Rate: 4.5%
- Loan Term: 30 years

Calculate:
- Monthly Interest Rate (Annual Rate / 12)
- Number of Payments (Years × 12)
- Monthly Payment (use PMT function or equivalent formula)
- Total Amount Paid (Monthly Payment × Number of Payments)
- Total Interest Paid (Total Paid - Principal)

Use formulas for all calculations.

formulaRequirements.description: Uses PMT function or equivalent formula

metadata.author: Benchmark System
metadata.notes: Tests financial PMT function and multi-step calculations
